links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Christopher Scott''' provided several voices in the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series of ''The Lord of the Rings'']]: [[Nazgûl]], "the Rider", "the Guard", [[Beregond]], and several unspecified bit parts.
